summary: An animated version of the epic Indian tale of Ramayana set to the 1920s jazz vocals of Annette Hanshaw.
cast: Annette Hanshaw|Aseem Chhabra|Bhavana Nagulapally|Manish Acharya|Reena Shah|Sanjiv Jhaveri|Pooja Kumar|Debargo Sanyal|Aladdin Ullah|Nitya Vidyasagar|Nina Paley|Deepti Gupta
keywords: title directed by female|based on folktale|cutout animation|1920s|work abroad
title: Sita Sings the Blues
